languages.text: Вольный Торговец назначил{mf||а} сразу трех настоятелей, убедив их трудиться сообща.
The Rogue Trader appointed three prelates at once, after convincing them to pool their efforts.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец назначил{mf||а} сразу трех настоятелей, убедив их трудиться сообща.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader appointed three prelates at once, after convincing them to pool their efforts.
The Rogue Trader appointed three prelates at once, after convincing them to pool their efforts.
The Rogue Trader appointed three prelates at once, after convincing them to pool their efforts.
The Rogue Trader appointed three prelates at once, after convincing them to pool their efforts.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ernannte drei Prälaten gleichzeitig, nachdem er sie überzeugt hatte, ihre Bemühungen zu bündeln.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader appointed three prelates at once, after convincing them to pool their efforts.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ernannte drei Prälaten gleichzeitig, nachdem er sie überzeugt hatte, ihre Bemühungen zu bündeln.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, üç piskoposu çabalarını birleştirmeye ikna ettikten sonra aynı anda atadı.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader appointed three prelates at once, after convincing them to pool their efforts.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, üç piskoposu çabalarını birleştirmeye ikna ettikten sonra aynı anda atadı.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente designó a tres prelados tras convencerlos de que aunaran sus esfuerzos.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader appointed three prelates at once, after convincing them to pool their efforts.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente designó a tres prelados tras convencerlos de que aunaran sus esfuerzos.

languages.text: 行商浪人同时任命了三位教长，说服他们齐心协力，取长补短。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader appointed three prelates at once, after convincing them to pool their efforts.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人同时任命了三位教长，说服他们齐心协力，取长补短。

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a nommé trois prélats après les avoir convaincus de faire cause commune.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader appointed three prelates at once, after convincing them to pool their efforts.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a nommé trois prélats après les avoir convaincus de faire cause commune.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーは、連中に協力するよう丸め込んでから、高位聖職者を三人まとめて任命した。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader appointed three prelates at once, after convincing them to pool their efforts.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは、連中に協力するよう丸め込んでから、高位聖職者を三人まとめて任命した。
